description: Evaluation services for project monitoring and evaluation of the Impact Assessment Agency of Canada.  Only eligible companies under the Solutions Based Supply Arrangement holder will be considered.  The selected company will provide evaluation services for project management tools and implementation strategies, and assist in the design and development of project monitoring and evaluation frameworks.
full_summary:
===============

# Tender Information for Evaluation Services
=====================================================

### RFP Details
----------------

* **RFP Title:** Evaluation Services for Impact Assessment Agency of Canada (IAAC)
* **RFP Reference Number:** TSPS-RFP-IAAC-403070-11-17-2023
* **RFP Publication Date:** November 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 1, 2023, 05:00:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 10, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

### Tender Description
----------------------

The Impact Assessment Agency of Canada (IAAC) is seeking evaluation services through a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Solutions Based Supply Arrangement (SA).

### Eligibility
-------------

Only those Supply Arrangement Holders under Solutions Based Supply Arrangement who qualified under Stream 2: Business consulting/change management services are eligible to participate in this RFP.

### Invited Tenderers
-------------------

The following 15 companies have been invited to submit proposals:

1. Bell Browne Molnar and Delicate Consulting Inc.
2. Goss Gilroy Inc.
3. Groupe Intersol Group Ltee.
4. Hackett Consulting Inc.
5. InterVISTAS Consulting Inc.
6. Kelly Sears Consulting Group
7. Le Groupe Conseil Bronson Consulting Group
8. Niewe Technology and Consulting Ltd.
9. PRA Inc.
10. QMR STAFFING SOLUTIONS INCORPORATED, 3D GLOBAL ENTERPRISES INC. IN JOINT VENTURE
11. R.A. Malatest & Associates Ltd.
12. TDV Global inc.
13. TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc., in joint venture
14. The Strategic Review Group Inc.
15. The Universalia Management Group Ltd.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
--------------------------------

The tender evaluation will be based on a combined weighted rating of 60% Technical Merit and 40% Price.

### Contact Information
----------------------

For more information about this RFP, please contact:

IAAC Procurement, Approvisionnement AEIC
procurement-approvisionnement@iaac-aeic.gc.ca
(343) 553-4686

### Location
-------------

The RFP will be conducted remotely, however, the expected contract deliverables will be in Ottawa, ON.

###
